title: What do you hate about this uni ?

comments.body: 75% attendance
Back in the day we had an 85% cap.
I'd back flip from top floor if they did that to us
The campus is so tiny.
Very high intake
Wifi
F off I had 85 back then, would kill for 75 ðŸ˜­
Very strict about attendance and assignments
Exams and intake of students

Attendance is 75 at almost all private unis , except BITS so that isnt a uni-specific thing to hate  
Intake is high but placements are somehow still excellent ( CS )

Campus is tiny but the infra is great , also its in the blr city so the campus size is understandable ( atleast in RR )

  
Something I do dislike tho is that hostels are kinda strict, there are workarounds but they can still make it chiller.
These kids don't know how bad 85% was ðŸ˜­
